issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `getCurrentEntrantVotes()`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow

issues.description: A possible transaction order independence vulnerability exists in function close(uint256). The value or direction of the call statement is determined from a tainted storage location
